Name: iot_utterance_meta.json â€” IoT-related scenario utterances (AssetOpsBench)
Time Series: No (this file contains scenario/utterance records that reference IoT datasets; it is not raw telemetry)
Dataset Characteristics: A small collection of IoT-focused utterance scenarios used to evaluate agent behavior for IoT discovery and data retrieval tasks. Each record contains an id, type, textual prompt, category, and a `characteristic_form` describing the expected response or file reference.
Associated Tasks: Knowledge-query evaluation, IoT site/asset discovery, agent routing for IoT data retrieval, prompt-based testing
Summary: 20 IoT-related scenario utterances (iot_utterance_meta.json) for AssetOpsBench. Scenarios ask agents to list sites, enumerate assets at sites, and return references to files or textual lists for IoT resources.
Description: This JSON file (`iot_utterance_meta.json`) contains 20 records of IoT-focused prompts used in AssetOpsBench. Each entry guides an agent through simple IoT discovery tasks (e.g., listing available sites, listing assets at the MAIN site). The `characteristic_form` field describes the expected return value or file reference. Use this file to validate agent capability to discover and reference IoT resources correctly and without hallucination.
